title: Whistlin' Dixie in a Nor'easter
description: Southern belle Leelee Satterfield leaves her beloved Memphis, Tennessee, to follow her husband's dream of managing a quaint Vermont inn. But when they arrive, young daughters and ancient Yorkie in tow, they discover pretty fast that there's a truckload of things nobody tells you about Vermont until you live there. When Leelee is left swindled and snowbound, she s forced to confront the true depth of her Southern grit in this foreign town.
author: Lisa Patton
